subject: Automobile Racing
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Though announced as a merger, it sounded like the Indy Racing League would be virtually swallowing up it’s rival, the Champ Car World Series.
snippet: Though announced as a merger, it sounded like the Indy Racing League would be virtually swallowing up it’s rival, the Champ Car World Series.
